name: The Frontier (itch) (Venrique, emartinezs, RickyGomez10, Marlpzg)
description:
A metroidvania like game set in the moon. 

You are sent on a mission to find out what happened to your colleagues who went to investigate the dark side of the moon...

Explore threat filled caves, perform near impossible jumps and reach the truth hidden by the darkness.

GitHub Repository

You can access the project source code in the following link.
